About me

I didn't know about front end development before, but a friend showed me and told me about it. And I really liked it. Create something that the user can see and interact with. I got the idea to become a web developer and started learning. Let's see what will come of it.

Skills

This is what I use in my projects

HTML5
It`s the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser
CSS3
The language for describing the presentation of Web pages, including colors, layout, and fonts. It allows one to adapt the presentation to different types of devices
SASS
Sass is a CSS preprocessor, which adds special features such as variables, nested rules and mixins into regular CSS. The aim is to make the coding process simpler and more efficient
JavaScript
It`s a scripting language that enables you to create dynamically updating content, control multimedia, animate images, and pretty much everything else
jQuery
jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation
Gulp
Gulp is a cross-platform, streaming task runner that lets developers automate many development tasks. At a high level, gulp reads files as streams and pipes the streams to different tasks.
React
A JavaScript library for building declarative and component-based user interfaces.
Redux
A Predictable State Container for JS Apps.
TypeScript
TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.
